name: tickle
effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Makes the foe laugh to
lower ATTACK and DEFENSE.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Makes the foe laugh to
lower ATTACK and DEFENSE.

laugh, reducing its
ATTACK and DEFENSE
stats.

and Defense stats.
